channel.title: Little league
channel.description: well has anyone heard of it? you know, like 10 year olds having a baseball league? the dude that created that used to live in my city and were the home of it. i dont no if this is only in united states. but i think its global. anybody ever see the national little league thing in august? my dad met the guy he died before i was born i think. i live in williamsport pennsylvania usa. ;D

item.title: Little league
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:23, topic:222174”][quote author=chrisn2323 link=topic=291810.msg2351387#msg2351387 date=1217012710]

No one likes baseball, other than yanks. Even though half of them don’t like it.

Wow. Last time I checked I wasn’t a yank.

Baseball is fun, is long as you don’t have horrible people who don’t know what to do with the ball defensively if it comes to them, or if they don’t know how to hit the ball correctly using proper techniques.

There are a few of us on my team which is mixed between people born in 1993-1994 who are actually good enough to play AAA or elite (I’m one of them, no joke), which is the highest you can get. Although, we are in the lowest possible level, just because it’s such a time consumer. Little league is just American that I know of, but they call it different things here in Canada.

do you mean AAU, because I don’t know what AAA is
[/quote]
Tico knows what he’s talking bout, he’s always playing baseball right tico? :P[/quote]

Damn right.

Read full topic

item.title: Little league
item.dc:creator: @Evil_G_S Evil G S
item.description:
@Evil_G_S wrote:

I play little league and I’m 13

There is an ‘A’ team which features 11-13 yr olds.
And there is a ‘B’ team which features 9-11 yr olds.

It is played in Moscow and in Spain, I’m sure I’ve seen it in more places becasue if you watch the Little League world series teams go to williamsport and play a tournement.

So far my team is 12-0 and we have won 2 tournemants and the league. We have 1 game today and 2 tomorrow for the CHAMPIONSHIP.

btw. I’m Copyright -AKA CopyFag.

Read full topic
